heading: Full-Stack Software Engineer
description: Highly driven Full Stack Engineer with 3 years of experience specializing in the modern JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystem. Expertise in React, Next.js, and Node.js to deliver robust, scalable, end-to-end solutions. Experienced with Relational/NoSQL databases, foundational AWS/CI/CD (Jenkins) knowledge, and a focus on leveraging core engineering principles and AI-driven workflows to maximize development speed and quality.
